title: GALIO NEEDS A RETEXTURE
body: Galio is a dragon and feel his ingame model is very old and doesn't look very cool! I think you could change his visuals so he looks more dragon like. Also, why does he shoot tornadoes instead of fire? Seems kind of silly!

replies.body: Galio is a gargoyle, meaning he's made from stone... and creates the wind using his wings.
Probably just a troll since there was a guy on here the other day that thought Galio was a dragon too.
Nah Gallo is definitely a Dragon, and if he isn't that's exactly why he needs a retexture, bc he looks like a Dragon atm
